title: Jubilation greets Ukrainian soldiers sweeping into Kherson.
description: After months of Russian occupation, residents said the moment recalled being liberated from the Nazis in World War II. But there was also fear and uncertainty.
dc:creator: Marc Santora, Anna Lukinova and Maria Varenikova
media:credit: Lynsey Addario for The New York Times
media:description: A Ukrainian woman weeping with joy as she embraces a Ukrainian soldier in Snihurivka, in the Kherson region of southern Ukraine, on Thursday.
